detailed_goals: Finalize promotional graphics such as key art and social media content.
Complete the primary game trailer and any additional teaser clips.
Conduct playtesting sessions to gather feedback on gameplay mechanics.
Optimize performance metrics for rendering, physics, and AI.
Identify and fix bugs found during playtesting.
Prepare documentation for development progress and next phase planning.
Conduct playtesting sessions to gather feedback on gameplay mechanics.
Optimize performance metrics for rendering, physics, and AI.
Identify and fix bugs found during playtesting.
Prepare documentation for development progress and next phase planning.
Combine all systems into a cohesive prototype.
Prepare documentation for handoff to Client Developers.
Present final mechanics and rules to the team; address any last-minute tweaks.
Polish deployment scripts and documentation.
Conduct final review and handoff to QA for testing.
Conduct final playtesting sessions to validate all game mechanics.
Compile a comprehensive bug report for the development team.
Prepare a final QA report summarizing testing outcomes and recommendations.
Polish all 3D models and animations for final integration.
Ensure all assets are optimized for performance.
Handoff finalized assets to the development team.
Conclude presentation of the project progress to stakeholders.
Finish playtesting and document gameplay refinements.
